Detailed Description

Class to manage the input or output of a service.

Contains the description of the input, the port TCP, UDP ....

Author:
Sebastien Pesnel

void InOutputAttribute::GenerateShortDescription ( SimpleString &  str  )  [virtual]

Add to str a short xml description of the attribut.

This description is composed by the kind of the attribute and the name. It can be generated with the method GenerateHeaderDescription. (to implement in the child)

Parameters:
str [in, out] the SimpleString where add the description

void InOutputAttribute::GenerateLongDescription ( SimpleString &  str  )  [virtual]

Add to str a long xml description of the attribut.

This description contained the descriptions and other data defined in child class. The description information can be added to a string with the method AddTagDescriptionToStr (to implement in the child)

Parameters:
str [in, out] the SimpleString where add the description

Extract data from XML.

Extract the name, the child node (but not the kind).

Parameters:
node XML node with tag name input, output or inoutput
